field.name: DestinationMAC
field.description: Specifies to which adapter the data frame is being sent. The Destination Address 1:1:1:1:1:1 specifies a Broadcast Message that is read in by all receiving Ethernet adapters.

field.name: SourceMAC
field.description: Specifies from which adapter the message originated.

field.name: EtherType
field.description: Identifies an upper layer protocol, encapsulating the frame data.
